resources.string: This is the first launch, the application needs to update the data, this may take a few tens of seconds, do you do now?
Welcome to the application Transports Rennes

The purpose of this map is to display all the points of interest of the application on a single map. To make the map clear, it was not possible to display all the points. That is why they were grouped together. The number displayed on the icon is the number of points of interest contained in the selected area. To see the detail of the group, double click on the icon.
An update of the STAR\'s data is available, do you want to download it now? You will have to reload schedules you have already loaded.

The application Transports Rennes was developed in the context of open data from the STAR and LE vélo STAR (data.keolis-rennes.com).
This application is developed and maintained by one person on personal time, so thank you for your indulgence.
Feel free to send me any suggestions or problem.
No more buses today, you can see all the buses of the day or choose a particular date using the menu.
No itinerary has been found for these addresses.
First access to line %1$s, loading data.
To fully enjoy this page, it is preferable to activate your GPS.
A widget is using this favorite, thank you for deleting it before the favorite.
\nLoading bus route %1$s which you have favorites.

Attention load data from all lines can take several minutes (5 minutes on a Nexus One), and will occupy approximately 8.5 MB of data, but you will have access to all schedules in offline mode. Are you sure you want to load (wifi strongly recommended)?
Calculation of possible routes in progress.
Choose from one to three favorite stops.
An error occurred while retrieving data from the STAR surely due to network problems, try again later.
An error occurred when querying the STAR surely due to network problems, try again later.
An error occurred while querying LE vélo STAR surely due to network problems, try again later.
The number of requests to twitter to your IP has been exceeded (150/h). This limitation will be reset to zero on %1$s
Error checking for updates surely due to network problems, try again later.
You have not yet started the application, please run it before trying to add widgets.
You do not have favorites yet. To use widgets add favorites.
Select at least one favorite stop.
An error occurred while geo-coding address, please try again later.
No matches were found for the starting address
No matches were found for the destination address
The GPS position has not yet been found.
An error occurred when calculating the route, please try again later.
Found several addresses, please detail address
The route requested has addresses outside the area covered.
No bus found for the requested time.
Unexpected error, a crash report was sent to the developer
A connection error has been detected, please try again later.
Transport Rennes, Android application to help you in transit of Rennes: http://goo.gl/ALKs0
The Bus line %1$s don\'t exist anymore in schedules, please reload the data.
